SYN_015_1_7:
[Indication]
Malignant bilobar obstruction (LUL and LLL).
[Anesthesia]
General Anesthesia via LMA.
[Description]
Flexible bronchoscopy performed. LUL tumor excised with snare/APC (fully open). LLL tumor treated with Cryo/Snare/APC (70% open). TXA used for hemostasis.
[Plan]
Monitor in PACU. Oncology referral for metastatic disease.
